Uses of Class
student.Student

    • Uses of Student in student

      Subclasses of Student in student 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  International
      This class contains information about international students and if they are study abroad or not.
      class  NonResident
      This class extends Student and contains operations and data that are specific to nonresidents.
      class  Resident
      This class is the superclass Resident and contains the profile and the credit hours that the student is taking and also has an operation for financial aid.
      class  Tristate
      This class contains information about tri-state students including the state that they live in (NY or CT) and gives them a discounted tuition rate.

      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private Student[] Roster.students

      Gets the student to be processed in Tab 1

      boolean Roster.add​(Student student)
      Adds an student to the roster.
      private int Roster.find​(Student student)
      find the student index, or return (-1) NOT_FOUND.
      void Roster.payTuition​(Student student, Date paymentDate, float payment)
      Allows a student in the roster to make a payment.
      boolean Roster.remove​(Student student)
      Removes an student from the roster.
      boolean Roster.setFinancialAid​(Student student, float aid)
      Set the financial aid amount for a resident student.
      boolean Roster.setStudyAbroad​(Student student, boolean studyAbroad)
      Allows an International student in the roster to be in the Study Abroad program.
